channel.title: PVP Zones & Commands
channel.description:
There is a server out there called BustScape, it has a command on there that would turn on PVP all over edge, the command was :: pvp, so im wondering how i would add this to my server
id really appreciate some help on this one, i couldn't add this myself because i'm unsure about command strings on 317.
Thank-you for reading,
- Lewis.
